channel.title: VPS - Connecting to a database on my computer (Updated Topic)
channel.description:
Is there a port I need to open up for the server running on my vps to connect to a mysql database on my computer? Because it won't connect using my IP.
(I didn't want to create multiple topics so I just edited this one.)

item.title: VPS - Connecting to a database on my computer (Updated Topic)
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Jmood:

You only buy an unmanaged server if you know what you’re doing. You might as well cancel and get a new host with a managed package.

I can’t afford it.

Read full topic

item.title: VPS - Connecting to a database on my computer (Updated Topic)
item.dc:creator: @bbwf bbwf
item.description:
@bbwf wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:4, topic:524376”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=642920.msg4329289#msg4329289 date=1373426377]

Did you ask support

i figured i’d come for the support here first. seemed like it would be a lot faster and a lot less hassle, but apparently not lol

it doesn’t help me much that i have no idea what i am doing
[/quote]

Idk, I have no idea why that’s happening, just thought I’d ask to see if they told you anything via a live chat.[/quote]

If it’s an unmanaged server they won’t do anything about it really…

Read full topic
